Articles.Content: Here's a random idea I had- Alarm sounds for say, low RCS, low Fuel, low Charge.... or proximity and such. Anyone else think this might be handy? Or cool?

Might be annoying to some people and would be a good idea to be able to toggle them off, but I'd be okay with them. I'd rather have the light on batteries(and add one to the stack batteries) change color when they're low or empty, though. Like that one mod that does exactly that.

But I'm usually looking at my ship's resources so I tend to know when I'm running low on anything.
WHERE is that mod. I could -seriously- use a visual indicator, what with the new SAS/reaction-wheel power draw.

Oh...I don't know, I just saw it once a few days ago. It adds a little light you place on your ship and it shifts to yellow at about half capacity on electric charge then shifts to red when you're almost empty >.>

Might be on spaceport, but if you do a bit of diggin', you might could find it in the addon release(or maybe development) forums >.>
Use the Master Alarm sound that was used in the Apollo missions

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/46518-WIP-Electric-Charge-Meter

It was in addon development(I did say it might've been there >.>).

I guess it's not actually released yet...how awkward >__>
